title: Malaysia Advances AI Sovereignty with Nvidia-Powered Data Center; BOOKMAP Summit to Unlock Investment Opportunities
description: KUALA LUMPUR, Malaysia, Dec. 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- BOOKMAP Malaysia will host an investor summit, “AI-Driven Investment Opportunities,” on December 3 at the Melia Hotel Kuala Lumpur. The Malaysian government, in partnership with Nvidia and YTL Power In…
